channel.title: Karils bow glitch! when ppl att monsters it doesnt hit anything?
channel.description: how do i fix the karils bow glitch.. when ppl attack monsters no hits show up, not even a zero, u can still get exp and stuff from the monsters but it wont hit so the monster stays there forever... how do i fix this?
